content: crochet double frill scrunchie - these will add colour and pizazz to your hair or you can wear them as bracelets the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** level easy copyright ©2022 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/double-frill-crochet-scrunchie/
